scripts.clean: echo "Removing modules and all public,distributions..."; rm -rf node_modules/ dist/ public/
scripts.dev: echo "Starting client-dev server and watching changes..."; webpack-dev-server
scripts.babel-run: echo "(dev only)Running server without compile..."; babel-node src/server.js
scripts.compile: echo "Compile server code..."; babel src/server.js -d dist
scripts.start: echo "Build all and run server..."; npm run build && npm run compile && node dist/server.js
